column4: Guys where can i find adobe flash x64? I installed both from software center but got the same i386 crap
go to adobe and download it there extract it , then copy the libflashplayer.so file to /usr/lib/mozilla/plugins with root permissions and you should be good to go.
try my method , it works for 64bit flash
Let me try this and if doesn't work gonna give it a go
